member.name: T:Amazon.ElasticInference.Model.AcceleratorType
member.summary: The details of an Elastic Inference Accelerator type.

member.name: P:Amazon.ElasticInference.Model.AcceleratorType.AcceleratorTypeName
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property AcceleratorTypeName.
The name of the Elastic Inference Accelerator type.

member.name: P:Amazon.ElasticInference.Model.AcceleratorType.MemoryInfo
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property MemoryInfo.
The memory information of the Elastic Inference Accelerator type.

member.name: P:Amazon.ElasticInference.Model.AcceleratorType.ThroughputInfo
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property ThroughputInfo.
The throughput information of the Elastic Inference Accelerator type.

member.name: T:Amazon.ElasticInference.Model.AcceleratorTypeOffering
member.summary: The offering for an Elastic Inference Accelerator type.

member.name: P:Amazon.ElasticInference.Model.AcceleratorTypeOffering.AcceleratorType
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property AcceleratorType.
The name of the Elastic Inference Accelerator type.

member.name: P:Amazon.ElasticInference.Model.AcceleratorTypeOffering.Location
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property Location.
The location for the offering. It will return either the region, availability zone or availability zone id for the offering depending on the locationType value.

member.name: P:Amazon.ElasticInference.Model.AcceleratorTypeOffering.LocationType
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property LocationType.
The location type for the offering. It can assume the following values: region: defines that the offering is at the regional level. availability-zone: defines that the offering is at the availability zone level. availability-zone-id: defines that the offering is at the availability zone level, defined by the availability zone id.

member.name: T:Amazon.ElasticInference.Model.DescribeAcceleratorOfferingsRequest
member.summary: Container for the parameters to the DescribeAcceleratorOfferings operation. Describes the locations in which a given accelerator type or set of types is present in a given region.

member.name: P:Amazon.ElasticInference.Model.DescribeAcceleratorOfferingsRequest.AcceleratorTypes
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property AcceleratorTypes.
The list of accelerator types to describe.

member.name: P:Amazon.ElasticInference.Model.DescribeAcceleratorOfferingsRequest.LocationType
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property LocationType.
The location type that you want to describe accelerator type offerings for. It can assume the following values: region: will return the accelerator type offering at the regional level. availability-zone: will return the accelerator type offering at the availability zone level. availability-zone-id: will return the accelerator type offering at the availability zone level returning the availability zone id.

member.name: T:Amazon.ElasticInference.Model.DescribeAcceleratorOfferingsResponse
member.summary: This is the response object from the DescribeAcceleratorOfferings operation.

member.name: P:Amazon.ElasticInference.Model.DescribeAcceleratorOfferingsResponse.AcceleratorTypeOfferings
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property AcceleratorTypeOfferings.
The list of accelerator type offerings for a specific location.

member.name: T:Amazon.ElasticInference.Model.DescribeAcceleratorsRequest
member.summary: Container for the parameters to the DescribeAccelerators operation. Describes information over a provided set of accelerators belonging to an account.

member.name: P:Amazon.ElasticInference.Model.DescribeAcceleratorsRequest.AcceleratorIds
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property AcceleratorIds.
The IDs of the accelerators to describe.

member.name: P:Amazon.ElasticInference.Model.DescribeAcceleratorsRequest.Filters
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property Filters.
One or more filters. Filter names and values are case-sensitive. Valid filter names are: accelerator-types: can provide a list of accelerator type names to filter for. instance-id: can provide a list of EC2 instance ids to filter for.

member.name: P:Amazon.ElasticInference.Model.DescribeAcceleratorsRequest.MaxResults
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property MaxResults.
The total number of items to return in the command's output. If the total number of items available is more than the value specified, a NextToken is provided in the command's output. To resume pagination, provide the NextToken value in the starting-token argument of a subsequent command. Do not use the NextToken response element directly outside of the AWS CLI.

member.name: P:Amazon.ElasticInference.Model.DescribeAcceleratorsRequest.NextToken
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property NextToken.
A token to specify where to start paginating. This is the NextToken from a previously truncated response.

member.name: T:Amazon.ElasticInference.Model.DescribeAcceleratorsResponse
member.summary: This is the response object from the DescribeAccelerators operation.

member.name: P:Amazon.ElasticInference.Model.DescribeAcceleratorsResponse.AcceleratorSet
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property AcceleratorSet.
The details of the Elastic Inference Accelerators.

member.name: P:Amazon.ElasticInference.Model.DescribeAcceleratorsResponse.NextToken
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property NextToken.
A token to specify where to start paginating. This is the NextToken from a previously truncated response.

member.name: T:Amazon.ElasticInference.Model.DescribeAcceleratorTypesRequest
member.summary: Container for the parameters to the DescribeAcceleratorTypes operation. Describes the accelerator types available in a given region, as well as their characteristics, such as memory and throughput.

member.name: T:Amazon.ElasticInference.Model.DescribeAcceleratorTypesResponse
member.summary: This is the response object from the DescribeAcceleratorTypes operation.

member.name: P:Amazon.ElasticInference.Model.DescribeAcceleratorTypesResponse.AcceleratorTypes
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property AcceleratorTypes.
The available accelerator types.

member.name: T:Amazon.ElasticInference.Model.ElasticInferenceAccelerator
member.summary: The details of an Elastic Inference Accelerator.

member.name: P:Amazon.ElasticInference.Model.ElasticInferenceAccelerator.AcceleratorHealth
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property AcceleratorHealth.
The health of the Elastic Inference Accelerator.

member.name: P:Amazon.ElasticInference.Model.ElasticInferenceAccelerator.AcceleratorId
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property AcceleratorId.
The ID of the Elastic Inference Accelerator.

member.name: P:Amazon.ElasticInference.Model.ElasticInferenceAccelerator.AcceleratorType
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property AcceleratorType.
The type of the Elastic Inference Accelerator.

member.name: P:Amazon.ElasticInference.Model.ElasticInferenceAccelerator.AttachedResource
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property AttachedResource.
The ARN of the resource that the Elastic Inference Accelerator is attached to.

member.name: P:Amazon.ElasticInference.Model.ElasticInferenceAccelerator.AvailabilityZone
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property AvailabilityZone.
The availability zone where the Elastic Inference Accelerator is present.

member.name: T:Amazon.ElasticInference.Model.ElasticInferenceAcceleratorHealth
member.summary: The health details of an Elastic Inference Accelerator.

member.name: P:Amazon.ElasticInference.Model.ElasticInferenceAcceleratorHealth.Status
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property Status.
The health status of the Elastic Inference Accelerator.

member.name: T:Amazon.ElasticInference.Model.Filter
member.summary: A filter expression for the Elastic Inference Accelerator list.

member.name: P:Amazon.ElasticInference.Model.Filter.Name
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property Name.
The filter name for the Elastic Inference Accelerator list. It can assume the following values: accelerator-type: the type of Elastic Inference Accelerator to filter for. instance-id: an EC2 instance id to filter for.

member.name: P:Amazon.ElasticInference.Model.Filter.Values
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property Values.
The values for the filter of the Elastic Inference Accelerator list.

member.name: T:Amazon.ElasticInference.Model.KeyValuePair
member.summary: A throughput entry for an Elastic Inference Accelerator type.

member.name: P:Amazon.ElasticInference.Model.KeyValuePair.Key
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property Key.
The throughput value of the Elastic Inference Accelerator type. It can assume the following values: TFLOPS16bit: the throughput expressed in 16bit TeraFLOPS. TFLOPS32bit: the throughput expressed in 32bit TeraFLOPS.

member.name: P:Amazon.ElasticInference.Model.KeyValuePair.Value
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property Value.
The throughput value of the Elastic Inference Accelerator type.

member.summary: This is the response object from the ListTagsForResource operation.

member.name: P:Amazon.ElasticInference.Model.ListTagsForResourceResponse.Tags
member.summary:

member.name: M:Amazon.ElasticInference.AmazonElasticInferenceClient.#ctor
member.summary:
Constructs AmazonElasticInferenceClient with the credentials loaded from the application's default configuration, and if unsuccessful from the Instance Profile service on an EC2 instance.
Example App.config with credentials set.
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <configuration> <appSettings> <add key="AWSProfileName" value="AWS Default"/> </appSettings> </configuration>

member.name: M:Amazon.ElasticInference.AmazonElasticInferenceClient.#ctor(Amazon.RegionEndpoint)
member.summary:
Constructs AmazonElasticInferenceClient with the credentials loaded from the application's default configuration, and if unsuccessful from the Instance Profile service on an EC2 instance.
Example App.config with credentials set.
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <configuration> <appSettings> <add key="AWSProfileName" value="AWS Default"/> </appSettings> </configuration>
member.param: The region to connect.
